EnterUserAndPass: Please enter a username and password
CommaSeparatedWords: Must be a list of comma separated words
NotSpacesInSlug: Not spaces allowed in slug. Please use a single word for the slug
SlugNotAvailable: Sorry but that slug is already taken. Try choosing a different one.
PageTypesDescription: The 'base page' is characterized by having a main image content and text.
PageTypesTwioColsDescription: On this page you can only add text, an introductory paragraph with two columns below, each with their respective companies.
PageTypesContactDesc: The 'contact page' is characterized by having two tables one with the Get in touch information and the other one with the social media networks.
PageTypesContactFormDesc: The 'contact page' is characterized by having a contact form and information about your adress, phone number and twitter user.
PageTypesGalleryDesc: The 'gallery page' is characterized by having a main listing unlimited images.
PageTypesLocationDesc: he 'map page' is characterized to show you a Google Map, with the address that you added.
PageTypesPollDesc: The 'poll page' is characterized to show you question and a textarea to answer it, and the submit button.
PageTypesBlogDesc: The 'blog page' is characterized to show you a list of post from a RSS url.
PageTypesSlideshowDesc: On this page you have a main slideshow with the images that you added and a text.
PageTypesTwitterDesc: On this page you can see the last 5 tweets you have in the twitter account that you links with it.
PageTypesYoutubeDesc: The 'youtube page' allows you to embed a youtube video.
TemplateTwoColsDesc: This template shows the menu as a list of buttons presented in a two columns grid. The menu is showed below the logotype image and tagline.
TemplateThreeColsDesc: This template shows the menu as a list of buttons presented in a three columns grid. The menu is showed below the logotype image and tagline.
TemplateAccordionDesc: The 'accordeon template' presents the pages in your site as a list of buttons. Clicking a button shows the page content as an accordion in the same page. The colapsable buttons are used to hide and show the information.
TemplateBottonRibbonDesc: This template presents a ribbon menu on the botton of the page. The menu uses icons instead of titles and touching an icon navigates to the page. The ribbon is visible in all pages.
TemplateButtonsDesc: This templates presents the menu as list of pages titles displayed as buttons. Touching a button navigates to the page.
TemplateColapsibleDesc: This template presents the pages in your site as a list of buttons. Clicking a button shows the page content as an accordion in the same page. The colapsable buttons are used to hide and show the information.The colapsable allows just a single page element open at the time
TemplateDialogDesc: This template present the menu a a dialog. The layout includes a single menu button, when this bottom is clicked a dialog diplays a list with all the pages in the site.
TemplateLeftRibbonDesc: This template presents a ribbon menu on the left side. The menu uses icons instead of titles and touching an icon navigates to the page. The ribbon is visible in all pages.
TemplateLeftSideDesc: In this template the pages menu slides from the left side. The slider menu diplays pages titles and touching the title navigates to the page. The menu button is presented in all the pages.
TemplateListMenuDesc: This templates shows the pages menu as a list of page titles. Touching a title navigates to the page.
TemplateRightRibbonDesc: This template presents a ribbon menu on the right side. The menu uses icons instead of titles and touching an icon navigates to the page. The ribbon is visible in all pages.
TemplateRightSideSliderDesc: In this template the pages menu slides from the right side. The slider menu diplays pages titles and touching the title navigates to the page. The menu button is presented in all the pages.
TemplateSingleDesc: The 'single page' is characterized by showing all the site content in a single page. All the pages are aranged in a single vertical stack.
TemplateTopRibbonDesc: This template presents a ribbon menu on the top. The menu uses icons instead of titles and touching an icon navigates to the page. The ribbon is visible in all pages.
TooltipSiteName: The site name is used to reference to your website
TooltipSlug: The slug is used to compose the full url for your site. The slug will be appended at the end of the webmob url like http://webmob.es/{slug}
TooltipDescription: Site description is only used internally to add a small description for the site. This information is not published in the site.
TooltipEmail: This is the mail where you are going to recive news, advices...
TooltipFacebook: This is your default facebook account for all your websites.
TooltipTwiter: This is your default twitter account for all your websites.
TooltipGooglePlus: This is your default Google Plus account for all your websites.
TooltipLinkedin: This is your default LinkedIn account for all your websites.
TooltipBasic: Basic account permits create a 3 websites.
TooltipSplashScreenImg: A splash screen is an image that appears while your website is loading. It may also be used to describe an introduction page on a website.
TooltipIcon: The icon is the simbol that appears in the explorer.
TooltipDesktopURL: Add here the full site URL if you are creating a mobile version of an existant desktop site. If you fill this information a buttons will be showed in your site which allows to navigate to the full site.
TooltipKeywords: Choose keywords related with your website contentent to improve your site positioning in Internet search engines like google.
TooltipAnalyticsURL: Paste here the code snippet provided by google analytics in order to analise the visits to your site using google analytics.
TooltipStatus: You have three status. 01 - Unpublish, only you can see the website. 02 - Changed, you have made changes but only you can see them. 03 - Publish, all people can see you site.
ChooseATemplateDesc: The home menu define how your site menu is organized
PromCodeOkMessage: Código promocional válido, por favor complete sus datos para crear la cuenta
CreateAccountFailedNoPromCodeMsg: You need a promo code to create an account. Contact us at: info@webmob.es
CreateAccountFailedTimeoutMsg: Username is already taken, choose another one.
PageTypeYoutubeDescription: Show any youtube video on your site
PageTypeSliderDescription: Show a few images in a nice slider
PageTypeTwo-columnsDescription: Add content formatted in two columns
PageTypeContact-formDescription: Add a page with a form to contact you
PageTypeRssDescription: Include live data sync with RSS
RemoveSiteDialogMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this site?
PageTypeYoutubePasteURL: Enter or paste the Youtube video url
